name: Pinball Tower - Prototype
description:
This is an early prototype of a game I am working on - Pinball Tower.

You can directly control the ball by clicking and dragging your mouse, to apply a force to the ball. This can be done once every 3 seconds. You will lose the game once the ball is off camera.

You get points for interacting with certain elements in the level, like the spinner or bumper. At the end your reached height will be added to the points.

If you played the game it would be greatly appreciated if you took part in this small survey to further improve the game:

https://forms.gle/ApRSsSLA41WFaSva7
